comment: Pretty good professor. Very clear and straightforward. Classes are not mandatory but its good to show up because most of his lecture notes aren't online. Only a few tests, lab quizzes and small homework assignments. Still provides some PDFS of slides, study guides, video clips and the textbook for tests.

Lectures were informative and interesting, 4 tests are in person but very easy, 3 labs (online and technically not mandatory but you will be quizzed on the material). He is very organized and makes detailed study guides for all tests! And always let class out early!
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things
